description: Crispy, caramelized roasted Brussels sprouts are easy to make and deliciously addictive! Choose from one of four flavors: sea salt, maple, balsamic or chipotle.
keywords: easy side dish, vegan side dishes
name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons adobo sauce (from a can of chipotle peppers)

recipeInstructions.text: Clean the Brussels sprouts and remove any wilted or brown outer leaves. Cut each sprout in half, lengthwise.

Arrange the Brussels sprouts on a baking sheet and drizzle them with olive oil. Use your hands to distribute and rub the oil evenly into the Brussels sprouts. Arrange the sprouts in an even layer. Sprinkle the sprouts with salt.
Place the baking sheet into the oven.
